name: Robert Stivanson
title: Software Engineer
aboutMe: Welcome, my name is Robert Stivanson. I am a software developer from Northwestern Pennsylvania. I have a passion for developing awesome software including games, desktop applications, web applications.
I spend most of my free time coding my next project. However when I'm not doing that, I am expanding my general knowledge, learning new ways to code, or playing Dungeons and Dragons.

general.description: Portfolio for Robert Stivanson, a software developer.
